body:
LEVI DAO 签署旨在废除死刑的《公民权利和政治权利国际公约》第二项任择议定书

LEVI DAO signs the second Optional Protocol to the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights aimed at abolishing the death penalty

https://www.un.org/zh/documents/treaty/files/A-RES-44-128.shtml
author: 0x1F1C29c94aBe2b8F06B403Cc5a61c479167ebc3D

space.name: 上海约西亚网络科技有限公司
